price: Kwani hajui watakapo fufuliwa waliomo makaburini?
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ
footnotes: Kwani hajui mwisho wa hali yake, hata hajui wakitolewa maiti waliomo makaburini,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
